sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access/>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.FNExtantDataJobUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Determines whether a data job is allowed to run.</description>
        <name>FNExtantDataJobUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[// field normalization

var FNExtantDataJobUtil = Class.create();

FNExtantDataJobUtil.canRun = function(current) {
   if (!(current.state == 'canceled' || current.state == 'not_started'))
      return false;

   var table = '' + current.fn_table;
   var id = '' + current.fn_id;
   var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
   if (!gr.get(id))
      return false;

   var result = false;
   if ((table == 'fn_normalize_config') || (table == 'fn_transform_config'))
       result = (gr.mode == 'active');
   else if ((table == 'fn_alias_value') || (table == 'fn_normal_value'))
       result = (gr.config.mode == 'active');
   else if (table == 'fn_rule')
       result = (gr.normal.config.mode == 'active');

   return result;
}

FNExtantDataJobUtil.prototype = {
  initialize : function() {
  }
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>tom.dilatush</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2010-12-25 16:05:10</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>1e3d513f0ab3015836714beaac14fdeb</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>FNExtantDataJobUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Field Normalization" source="com.snc.field_normalization">74d312912f730110d8a4d5f62799b6a5</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1e3d513f0ab3015836714beaac14fdeb</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>tom.dilatush</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2011-02-01 15:47:14</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>817</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
